item.title: How to make a command to kill anyone? like ::kill
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“surfer25, post:16, topic:342479”] if(command.startsWith("kill") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Cola")) { try { final int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.split(" ")[1]); } catch(Exception exception) { sendMessage("::kill playerName"); return; } if(index != -1) { client client = (client) PlayerHandler.players[index]; client.isDead = true; client.sendMessage(playerName+" just killed you!"); } }[/quote]
what if there is a space in the name?

item.title: How to make a command to kill anyone? like ::kill

if(command.startsWith("kill") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Cola")) { try { final int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.split(" ")[1]); } catch(Exception exception) { sendMessage("::kill playerName"); return; } if(index != -1) { client client = (client) PlayerHandler.players[index]; client.isDead = true; client.sendMessage(playerName+" just killed you!"); } }

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Cola”)) {
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
playerHitpoints == 0;
}
}

		[/code]

But idk??
